name: Shardbound
summary: Shardbound is a Tactical CCG. As you play, you’ll collect hundreds of units and build armies to compete head-to-head with other players in matches of cunning and skill. Use positioning, the terrain, and your units’ unique abilities to achieve victory.
info:
• 游戏类型: Tactical CCG
  • 游戏引擎: 虚幻4
  • 官方网站: http://www.shardbound.com/
